remarks: Definition of the category Rng, relativized to a subset ` u ` .  This is the category of all non-unital rings in ` u ` and homomorphisms between these rings.  Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement: df-rngc $p |- RngCat = ( u e. _V |-> ( ( ExtStrCat ` u ) |`cat ( RngHomo |` ( ( u i^i Rng ) X. ( u i^i Rng ) ) ) ) ) $.
